entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 10:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then northeast 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
